title: Didnt get mastery 6 token.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I didnt a mastery 6 token for Bard and Nasus after getting an S on them. I did, though, get them mastery 5 in the same game i got the mastery 6 token. So If I get them mastery 5 in a game, then I get an S, and I get a notification I got a mastery 6 token for that champ, do I not get it?

replies.body: In order to get a mastery 6 token, you need to have been mastery level 5 when the game starts.  It's not possible to receive both after the same game.  More information is also available in our [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  I hope that helps clear things up, and congrats on your achievement!
Thanks. Yeah I didnt look at the message that it gave me, I just assumed it was one.
Are you sure? I've received Mastery Tokens for Mastery 6 in the same game as that I achieve Mastery 5.
Super sure!  What you probably saw was an animated notification that introduces you to the token system, but not actually awards it.  It's kind of confused at first!
Happened to me too. I thought it was a mast 6 token but it was just a message saying you can earn them now
